title: I can't spam NA LCS summoner icons in game.
body:
Hi all,

I recently bought the NA LCS summoner icons bundle for 2k RP for the sole intention of spamming the emote in-game but when I joined a game on the practice tool, it still didn't work. I had the CLG icon equipped but it didn't work. I pressed CTRL + 6 to see if it would work but it didn't. I played on Lee Sin which i have mastery 6 and Ivern (no mastery). Lee Sin showed the mastery 6 but nothing else.

I've tried changing the spellbind to C to no avail.

If this isn't possible and i can't spam the emote, i'd like a refund of RP as i feel i've been heavily ripped off because i saw this the last few seasons.

Can anyone help?

replies.body:
Maybe I'm missing something here, but after checking the bundle on the store I'm a bit confused as to where you saw there was going to be an emote included when you buy the NA LCS Summer Icons bundle. If you have a link to where we mention it for **this** season, that would be awesome to see so we can double-check and make sure that's working properly. There's a chance that an emote could still pop up as we get closer to Worlds, but I don't want to make any promises.

If it turns out there isn't an emote provided as you desired, you can always [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look into seeing what we can do for that refund. Let me know if you have any other questions :)

Hiya Pachi,

Errr, you're correct. I didn't read anywhere that the bundle came with emote's in game. I merely assumed so because at one point, i saw someone use the emote and was really happy with it. Therefore, i bought them out of impulse and now am feeling a bit sad that the emote's aren't there. I looked up online and people said that all you needed to do was equip the icon and press CTRL + 6. Now i feel a bit sad :(

Would it be best to submit a ticket?
